about_the_game:
An erotic open-world "science adventure" in which you must solve mysteries by completing quests and forging relationships.

You are Lewis: an heir to one of the largest tech companies on the planet. Sent to stay with your uncle, you arrive at his manor to find it in a state of complete desolation- save for some mysterious noises coming from behind a locked basement door. What you uncover inside will change the course of your life, as a chain of events is set off that will see you uncover the secrets behind a mysterious plot that has been decades in the making.

What dark secrets has your family been keeping from the rest of the world? Who is this mysterious girl living in your uncle's mansion? Will you ever be able to return to the normal, peaceful life you once had?

Use your "tools" and intuition to explore the nearby town of Linle and foster relationships with its residents to uncover the truth about your family.

- RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM: befriend and romance different characters!
- OPEN WORLD EXPLORATION: secrets lurk around every corner!
- ANIMATED SEX SCENES: a multitude of high quality erotic scenes!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains explicit depictions of sexual interactions between consenting adults.
